full_output.summary: I am Kiran Kumar Namala, a Computer Science and Engineering (B.Tech CSE) graduate from SRM AP University, specializing in Data Science. I have a knowledge in machine learning,Web development and have successfully completed projects in this field. With intermediate knowledge in Python, Java, and C++, I am eager to contribute my skills and knowledge to innovative projects

projects.name: Amazon Clone
projects.description: Developed a structured HTML document with semantic elements for SEO and accessibility, ensuring responsiveness with viewport meta tag and percentage-based units. Implemented CSS flexbox for layout, box model properties for spacing, and CSS variables for theme flexibility. Designed a navigable navbar with dropdown menus, icons, and a slider with navigation controls for enhanced visual appeal. Incorporated JavaScript for interactive features like slider functionality, optimized image loading, smooth scrolling, and cross-browser compatibility testing for consistent performance.

projects.name: Library Management System
projects.description: Developed a Java-based Library Management System with a GUI using Swing for user interaction. Implemented functionalities for adding, removing, and reserving books, ensuring data persistence using file handling (Java I/O). Designed a responsive user interface with buttons and input dialogs for intuitive book management operations. Utilized Java for backend logic, including file operations, event handling, and better content display through JOptionPane dialogs.

full_output.name: Kiran Kumar Namala
